definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: burden-bearer, (late);—only abs. ´[[ס]] coll. Ne 4:4, 2Ch 2:1, 2Ch 2:17; mpl. abs. [[סַבָּלִים]] 2Ch 34:13; —[[נשֵׁׂא סַבָּל]] 1Ki 5:29 is certainly wrong; LXX ai)/rontev a)/rsin, Vulgate qui onera portabant, hence prob. [[נשֵׁׂא סֵ֫בֶל]]; > [[אִישׁ סַבָּל]], as ‖ 2Ch 2:1.
